Posts.Content: Jan 6, 2012 10:55PM Onecent46 wrote: I have had body aches during and after my treatments but now that the treatments are over, I find that I have more pain in my body.  I mentioned it to my doctor who told me to take some over the counter joint pain reliever.  The pain isn't only in my joints and the pain reliever did not help.  It is hard to sleep sometimes because it hurts so bad.  I even asked my regular family dr about it and he said to take the tylenol 3 that I still had left from surgery.  It does not help much either.  I went to the health food store and the woman working in there told me that some patients get fybro after treatment but that doctors won't tell you that.
Posts.Title: anyone out there with auto-immune/chronic pain issues before dx? jessamine SuzyBlue
